content: purled single_crochet ip-single_crochet with yarn held in back insert hook in indicated stitch back to front yo and pull up a loop yo and pull thru 2 loops to complete stitch pattern notes hat is worked side to side and seamed the crown is closed with spiraling rounds of slip_stitch decreases then edge trim is added to the bottom of the beanie in joined turned rounds the body stitch pattern is worked in short row creating strips of lozenge shapes separated by a divider with complementary textures the hat body stitch pattern is from the mypicot com website free stitch dictionary identified as stitch #0085 a very detailed picture tutorial and chart can be found on their website but be aware that i have changed a few details of the stitch pattern https //mypicot com/0085 html watch your gauge with the slip stitches use a relaxed gauge i hesitate to say loose because then we can end up with sloppy we usually work slip_stitch projects with a larger hook try that if you need to but i think it s best to learn how to adjust your gauge as necessary to adjust hat height add or subtract foundation chains in increments of 6 stitches pattern body lozenge section foundation chain
